actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, S. Rept. 93-831.
Measure passed Senate, amended, roll call #216 (49-19).

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 93-1419.
Measure failed of passage in House under suspension of the rules, roll call #712 (196-181).

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act, of 1968 by designating a segment of the New River as a potential component of the national wild and scenic rivers system.

summary.text: Designates, under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act a segment of the New River as a potential component of the national wild and scenic rivers system. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 1276(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act, of 1968 by designating a segment of the New River as a potential component of the national wild and scenic rivers system.
